content:
What an amazing adventure you're planning! I'd be happy to help you estimate the driving time and fuel cost for your Grand Canyon road trip.

To get started, I'll need to know a few more details from you. Can you please provide the following information:

1. Where are you starting from? (City and state)
2. What's your planned route to the Grand Canyon? Are you taking a specific route or would you like me to suggest a few options?
3. What type of vehicle are you driving? (Make, model, and year, if possible) This will help me estimate fuel efficiency.
4. How many people will be traveling with you?
5. Are there any specific stops or attractions you'd like to include along the way?

Regarding your Yellowstone trip, wow, 12 hours is quite a drive! Reno, Nevada is a great stopping point on the way to Yellowstone. Did you enjoy your trip to Yellowstone? What were some of your favorite sights and experiences?

Once I have the necessary information, I'll do my best to estimate the driving time, fuel cost, and provide any additional tips or recommendations for your Grand Canyon adventure!
